Text: funny movie !! check it out and see what you think .looking for a movie called THE DUKE OF EARL does anybody have it ? if so upload it please thank you.

Thanks! I Will Comment on quality after watching. I've been waiting for this one! Love Mike Judge! Those who don't know; he directed this movie. You might know him from Beavis and Butthead, King Of The Hill, Daria, Officespace, Idiocracy, etc.  He apparently lives in a house about 15-20 miles from mine. I always hope to run into him to get an autograph.
